LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome to PathTime
LOGIN.TEXT: Login to discover taylormade paths and activities for you!

ACTIONS.SHARE: Share to one of my group

ALERT.TITLE: Not so fast!
ALERT.TEXT: You must chose at least the city and one category.

ALERTMOOD.TITLE: Add a Mood
ALERTMOOD.TEXT: We don't have the mood that you want, let us know which one is it!
ALERTMOOD.NAME: Mood name
ALERTMOOD.DONETEXT: We received your request and we will take care of it as soon as possible.

ALERTCATEGORY.TITLE: Add a Category
ALERTCATEGORY.TEXT: We don't have the category that you want, let us know which one is it!
ALERTCATEGORY.NAME: Category name
ALERTCATEGORY.DONETEXT: We received your request and we will take care of it as soon as possible.

EMPTY.TITLE: Oops
EMPTY.TEXT: We didn't find any paths corresponding to your filters. Try to be less specific and maybe you will get lucky.

PLACE.PARTONE: Based on your interest, moods and habits, Share and Give truly helpful recommandations to likeminded pathers.
PLACE.PARTTWO: Turn you spots into Inspirations, Turn inspirations into Ideas !

PATH.PARTONE: If you want to spread your story, your adventure and share it to pathers with common interest, you're in the right spot !
PATH.PARTTWO: Create Path and show the way to a likeminded community what an adventure sounds like to you !

TITLE.VALIDATE: Add this place to your path ?

CREATE.NEW_VALIDATION: Which of the following best describes this place?

DETAILS.COMMENTACTION: You have been in this place ?

DETAILS.CREATOR: Creator
DETAILS.UNDONETEXT: This path is a personal path, to create a real one from this path give us some feedback about it!
This path is a personal path, to create a real one from this path give us some feedback about it!

FEED.TITLE: News Feed
FEED.TEXT: You don't have any news yet. Start using the app and your news feed will follow. You can also search for your friend in the search bar to see their activities on PathTime!

FOLLOW.TITLE: My Follows
FOLLOW.TEXT: No friends at the moment? Look out for your friends with the News feeds search bar :) !

FOLLOWOTHER.TITLE: Follows
FOLLOWOTHER.TEXT: This user has no follow yet.

FOLLOWER.TITLE: My Followers
FOLLOWER.TEXT: No friends at the moment? Look out for your friends with the News feeds search bar :) !

FOLLOWEROTHER.TITLE: Followers
FOLLOWEROTHER.TEXT: This user has no follower yet.

HISTORIC.TITLE: My Historic
HISTORIC.TEXT: Like, comment, create, inspire yourself et share your experiences! The historic will come right after.

PATHLIST.TITLE: My PathList
PATHLIST.TEXT: Create a path, Share it with your community and let the pathers with the same personality than you enjoy it !

PATHLISTOTHER.TITLE: Empty PathList
PATHLISTOTHER.TEXT: No path or place registered yet.

RECORDS.TITLE: My Records
RECORDS.TEXT: No records for now ? You can like and records every path and activities that you enjoy

TODOS.TITLE: My ToDo
TODOS.TEXT: No ToDo for now ? You can like and add in your ToDo every path and activities that you enjoy

PHOTO.TITLE: My Pics
PHOTO.TEXT: During your activities and path creation you also could add some pictures to it !

FEEDLOADING.TITLE: News Feed
FEEDLOADING.TEXT: Let us some time to find out if you have news!

GROUPSLOADING.TITLE: My Crews
GROUPSLOADING.TEXT: Let us some time to find your crews!

GROUPVOTING.TITLE: Events
GROUPVOTING.TEXT: You don't have any event to vote for? Create one by using the button located at the top right of this page :
GROUPVOTING.SUBTITLE: Great, your crew is all set! Looking to organize an event?

GROUPTODO.TITLE: ToDo
GROUPTODO.TEXT: Not a single ToDo yet? Validate an event by using the button that appears when you swipe an event :

GROUPDONE.TITLE: Done
GROUPDONE.TEXT: You already did an event? Rate and comment this event in order to discover new activies !

GROUPS.TITLE: My Crews
GROUPS.TEXT: You don't have any crew! Create one with the add button!

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: My Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.TEXT: You d'ont have any notification yet!

NORESULT.TITLE: Nothing found
NORESULT.TEXT: You find something that we currently not have. If you know a place please add it :) !
